attributes.action: Stop the neighbourhood plan in Torbay
attributes.additional_details: They have admitted that woodend should not be on the list, yet they refuse to remove us
attributes.background: They are trying to save green spaces, but refusing to listen to people who do not or never have wanted to be part of this. Woodend project could close because of this and be forced to repay thousands. They do not have authorisation and are just doing what they want instead of listening to the people

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions that are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. Planning decisions are a matter for local authorities. 

You may wish to consider starting a petition using the Torbay Council site:

https://www.torbay.gov.uk/council/how-the-council-works/petitions/
